posts.title: Prank Earwax Candle Kit
posts.content: Give your friend a good laugh for their birthday by placing their gift inside this prank earwax candle kit box. This highly realistic printed box conceals your actual gift in what looks like a ridiculous item meant to extract earwax to create truly unique candles.

posts.title: Dog Bunk Bed
posts.content: Give your pup a little extra room to lounge around by moving him into this dog bunk bed. Designed for small breeds, this durable pet home offers your furry friend both a cozy indoor environment and an open air rooftop so he can enjoy the weather.

posts.title: Star Wars AR Stormtrooper Robot
posts.content: Ward off the Resistance – or any intruder who tries to enter your bedroom – by placing this Star Wars augmented reality stormtrooper robot on patrol. It comes with facial recognition, takes direct verbal orders, and can launch attacks via the app interface.

posts.title: Photography Atmosphere Aerosol Can
posts.content: Get studio quality photos by creating visually stunning effects with this atmosphere aerosol can. With a few sprays you’ll be able to get a quality haze/fog effect without needing expensive and cumbersome fog/smoke machines.

posts.title: Ultra Loud Alarm Clock And Bed Shaker
posts.content: If standard alarms just aren’t cutting it, this ultra loud alarm clock and bed shaker is guaranteed to wake up even the heaviest of sleepers. It features a 113db extra-loud alarm with an adjustable tone along with a 12 volt vibrator that’ll violently shake and wake you.

posts.title: LEGO Batman Tumbler
posts.content: If you think driving a Tumbler is hard, just wait until you try assembling one in LEGO form! This highly detailed Batman Tumbler will drive both comic and LEGO enthusiasts wild as they work on building their very own mini Tumbler – complete with Batman and Joker.

posts.title: The Shower Locker
posts.content: Keep your roommates from using your hygienic products by storing them inside this shower locker. It’s designed to be mounted directly onto the wall and comes with a waterproof 3-number combination lock that’ll ensure your belongings remain secure.

posts.title: Glass Chess Board
posts.content: Give the old game room a touch of elegance with the glass chess board. This classy board is designed with frosted and transparent glass squares and comes with finely crafted glass pieces lined with felt on the bottom so as not to scratch the table.

posts.title: The Height Adjustable TV Pole Mount
posts.content: Why limit yourself to drilling holes in the wall when now you can mount your TV anywhere in your home with the height adjustable TV pole mount? It can support any TV ranging from 32 to 65 inches and can easily swivel for the best viewing experience.

posts.title: Solar Jar Lamps
posts.content: The solar jar lamps are the hip and eco-friendly alternative to the regular lamps that create a colorful nighttime atmosphere in the backyard with the flick of a switch. They provide a rustic touch to the yard while emitting a soft glow ideal for relaxing under the starry sky.

posts.title: First Person View R/C Drone
posts.content: Get a bird’s eye view in real time by taking to the skies using this first person view remote control quadcopter drone. It utilizes seven sensors to ensure a stable flight and shoots full HD 1080p videos in both JPEG and DNG fotmat.

posts.title: William Shakespeare’s Star Wars
posts.content: What would Star Wars sound like if it were written 400 years ago? Wonder no more – now you can experience the greatest saga of all time told in Old English and iambic pentameter with William Shakespeare’s Star Wars. A true must have for Star Wars and literature geeks.
